## EditorApi.setLineWrapping() method

Set whether or not the editor wraps lines vs using a horizontal scrollbar

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setLineWrapping(lineWrapping: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type |
|  --- | --- |
|  lineWrapping | boolean |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
